mapper.select: select paper_name,score from score,paper_show,student where sid = #{id} and student.id = score.sid and paper_show.paper_id = score.paper_id

select name, score from score,student where score.paper_id = #{id} and score.sid = student.id
and score.score = 100
and score.score < 60
and score.score between #{score} and #{score}+9
